us.pserver.cdr

Class StringByteConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.pserver.cdr.StringByteConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Converter<java.lang.String,byte[]>

    public class StringByteConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Converter<java.lang.String,byte[]>
    Conversor de String em byte array (byte[]), utilizando a codificação de caracteres UTF-8.
